entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 37 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 37 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 48 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few clouds. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 48 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
